title: Amazon Earnings Are Due Today. All Eyes Will Be on AI.
text: While analysts are generally upbeat about the upcoming results, capital spending and AI revenues will be a key focus.

title: Amazon set to join Big Tech's spending surge as AI race heats up
text: Amazon.com is expected to join Google and Microsoft on Thursday in reporting a surge in capital spending on artificial intelligence as Big Tech companies rush to capitalize on the booming technology.

title: EXCLUSIVE: 'Restaurants Are To SoundHound AI What Books Were To Amazon,' CEO Tells Benzinga
text: In an exclusive interview with Benzinga, Keyvan Mohajer, CEO of SoundHound AI Inc. SOUN, shed light on the company's recent endeavors and its vision for the future.

title: Amazon earnings come with a higher bar this time around

title: AAPL or AMZN: Which Mag 7 Stock Should You Buy Before Earnings?
text: Investors are eagerly awaiting results from Apple (AAPL) and Amazon (AMZN) to get a glimpse of the growing impact of AI, including Generative AI.

title: Will Amazon's (AMZN) Q2 Earnings Benefit From AWS Momentum?
text: Amazon's (AMZN) second-quarter results are expected to reflect significant gains from AWS momentum, driven by growing generative AI capabilities.

title: Why Amazon Stock Popped on Wednesday
text: Amazon is already the largest purveyor of e-commerce in the U.S. The company is further expanding its logistics and delivery services, tweaking its practices to better serve more rural areas. Amazon's dominance in more than one market and attractive valuation make the stock a buy.

title: Amazon's AWS Growth Expected To Outpace Microsoft Azure, Analyst Optimistic
text: JMP Securities analyst Nicholas Jones rated Amazon.com Inc AMZN shares with Market Perform and a price target of $225.

title: The Top 3 Consumer Stocks to Buy Now: Summer 2024
text: While the stricter definition of consumer stocks might only consist of consumer discretionary stocks, in this article, I will utilize the larger definition that is inclusive of both consumer staple and discretionary sectors. Generally, consumer staples include companies that sell essential goods and services such as food, beverages, and everyday household items.

title: Amazon Earnings: How to Trade AMZN Stock Before and After the August 1 Report
text: Amazon's (NASDAQ: AMZN ) share price has tumbled by almost 10% from its peak of $200 set in early July. Investors have taken profits and are rotating into small-cap stocks that will benefit most from lower interest rates.

title: Amazon Upgrades Checkout AI to Boost Third-Party Adoption
text: As Amazon looks to license its Just Walk Out checkout system to more stores, the eCommerce giant is upgrading the artificial intelligence model to improve accuracy.

title: 2 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks to Buy Now and Hold for Decades
text: Amazon's AWS holds 31% of the global cloud computing market, making it a cornerstone of the AI industry. No other company comes close to matching IBM's massive volume of patented AI innovation.

title: Amazon responsible for hazardous 3rd-party products and recall, federal agency says
text: Amazon is being held responsible by a federal agency for distributing 400,000 products that are defective or do not meet safety standards.

title: 2 Growth Stocks to Buy in 2024 and Hold for at Least a Decade
text: The tech market is on a promising growth path, with the emergence of industries like AI making now an excellent time to invest. Amazon has delivered significant stock gains this year but remains a bargain compared to its potential.
